trans-unit.source: A package that extends Flask-RESTful resources to make creating resources for database use easier and faster.
trans-unit.target: 一个扩展Flask-RESTful资源的包,使创建用于数据库的资源更加简单快捷。

trans-unit.source: And, if the issue encountered does not fit this package's approach, the original resource classes can be used with no loss of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 而且,如果遇到的问题不符合本包的方法,可以使用原有的资源类,功能不受损失。

trans-unit.source: Creating a website can result in a fair amount of boilerplate code as the same characteristics for table models are recreated at each layer. Then, the boilerplate code must be tested as well, resulting in boilerplate testcode.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个网站可能会产生相当多的锅炉模板代码,因为在每一层都要重新创建表模型的相同特性。然后,锅炉板代码也必须进行测试,从而产生锅炉板测试代码。

trans-unit.source: DBBase enables the same coding of database models to be used within Flask or without, such as from message queues.
trans-unit.target: DBBase可以在Flask内或不在Flask内使用相同的数据库模型编码,如从消息队列中。

trans-unit.source: Inherent in the design is an understanding that the simplest cases can be done simply, but that there are additional ways to open up the functionality to accommodate more complex issues.
trans-unit.target: 在设计中,固有的理解是,最简单的案例可以简单地完成,但有额外的方法来开放功能,以适应更复杂的问题。

trans-unit.source: This package extends Flask-RESTful by implementing datacentric Web API Resources using DBBase for enabling the use of SQLAlchemy.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包通过使用DBBase实现以数据为中心的Web API资源来扩展Flask-RESTful，以支持使用SQLAlchemy。

trans-unit.source: This package should be thought of as a tool rather than a framework. It can coexist with other Flask packages. A framework can get awkward on edge cases as a seemingly straight-forward idea turns out to be very difficult due to trying to fit it into the framework design.
trans-unit.target: 这个包应该被认为是一个工具而不是一个框架。它可以与其他Flask包共存。一个框架在边缘情况下可能会变得很尴尬,因为一个看似简单明了的想法由于试图将其融入框架设计而变得非常困难。

trans-unit.source: Using this package, the database models are introspected and applied to the API, resulting in less code over all.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个包,可以对数据库模型进行反省并应用到API中,从而减少了所有的代码。
